channel.title: (317)Tuts(317)
channel.description:
Things u going learn *Make ur self mod/admin or owner *Add objects *Rotate objects *add npcs *let npcs talk *make a teleport command
*Make urself mod/admin or owner* first login on ur server. walk 10 secs log out than go into our source map search for charachters if u found u will click 2 times on it. u will see much accounts (If u delete no things on that map) find yours,if u found ur name like Dylan.txt u need to open it than (2 time click!) now u see something like this [b][ACCOUNT] character-username = Dylan character-password = Not for u:P [CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3338 character-posy = 3212 [b]character-rights = 0[/b] character-ismember = 0 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20060101 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 4377
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 664 0 character-equip = 1 6568 0 character-equip = 2 1725 0 character-equip = 3 6528 1 character-equip = 4 1115 0 character-equip = 5 3842 0 character-equip = 6 -1 0 character-equip = 7 2497 0 character-equip = 8 -1 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 3105 0 character-equip = 11 -1 0 character-equip = 12 -1 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 0 character-look = 2 1 character-look = 3 2 character-look = 4 0 character-look = 5 0
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 1 0 character-skill = 1 1 0 character-skill = 2 77 750000 character-skill = 3 73 201155 character-skill = 4 1 0 character-skill = 5 1 0 character-skill = 6 1 0 character-skill = 7 1 0 character-skill = 8 1 0 character-skill = 9 1 0 character-skill = 10 1 0 character-skill = 11 1 0 character-skill = 12 1 0 character-skill = 13 1 0 character-skill = 14 1 0 character-skill = 15 1 0 character-skill = 16 1 0 character-skill = 17 1 0 character-skill = 18 1 0 character-skill = 19 1 0 character-skill = 20 1 0 character-skill = 21 1 0 character-skill = 22 1 0 character-skill = 23 1 0 character-skill = 24 1 0
[ITEMS]
[BANK]
[FRIENDS]
[IGNORES]
[EOF][/b]
like that than now u need to find rights in that text document like this [b]character-rights = 0[/b]
change the 0 to 1=mod/2=admin/3=owner/co-owner if u changed the 0 to 3 u need to safe it so if u have did that you can log in whoppaaa! owner easy. (Not for all:P) next tut is *Add objects* if u say somethings i give other tut (Dont flame im not good in english and making tuts!)

item.title: (317)Tuts(317)
item.dc:creator: @dylan_mast dylan mast
item.description:
@dylan_mast wrote:

srry but some other people need that (NOOB) things.
but now comes that tut from
Making object
Ok first u log in on ur owner account.
Search for a place that u want to make a object.
Do ::mypos for ur x y .
Search for ur client.java in ur source.
Open it and search for Makeglobalobject.
Now u see something like this
public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType) { // Makes Global objects
under that u need to past
makeGlobalObject(X, Y, Objectid, -3, 10);// Object name (Dont need)
change the X to ur X so like for me 3344 and for Y i need tho past 3220 ur cordinates is different and other than that from me if u want a objectlist u need to find on sites.
2213 is bank booth
but if u done the object its look than like this (For bank booth)
makeGlobalObject(3344, 3220, 2213, -3, 10);// bank booth

and save it and compile and restart ur server
if u did all good should u now have a object.
its dont work for BLANK SOURCE!!!
if u want to see something i made in 1 min

Read full topic

@dylan_mast wrote:

Things u going learn
*Make ur self mod/admin or owner
*Add objects
*Rotate objects
*add npcs
*let npcs talk
*make a teleport command

Make urself mod/admin or owner
first login on ur server.
walk 10 secs
log out than
go into our source map
search for charachters
if u found u will click 2 times on it.
u will see much accounts (If u delete no things on that map)
find yours,if u found ur name like Dylan.txt
u need to open it than
(2 time click!)
now u see something like this
